title: Birdcage, 1850–99
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Hanging type. Cruciform shape. Pierced metal sides painted green and red. Cage attached to base by four wire loops.  (B) Base is of inverted umbrella shape, on flaring circular foot. Eight groups of painted flowers on underside.

tombstone.epitaph:
Birdcage, 1850–99.
1850–99. Galvanized iron and wire.. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1916-19-49-a,b.
